name: IMMZ.DT.13.Tick-BorneEncephalitis
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Tick-Borne Encephalitis vaccine according to the defined schedule

action.title: Immunize Patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis - No Doses
action.description: Provide Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunizations – using the "FSME-Immun vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis using FSME-Immun because no doses on a 3 dose scheme
Should vaccinate patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis using FSME-Immun because no doses on a 3 dose scheme
